t: Amazon had a secret operation to gather intel on rivals like Walmart and FedEx, reportedly called Big River

t: Amazon River | Facts, History, Location, Length, Animals, & Map | Britannica
s: July 24, 1998 - Amazon River, the greatest river of South America and the largest drainage system in the world in terms of the volume of its flow and the area of its basin. The total length of the river is at least 4,000 miles (6,400 km), which makes it slightly shorter than the Nile River.

t: The Amazon, measuring a mighty river | U.S. Geological Survey
s: The Amazon, the world's largest river, discharges enough water into the sea each day to provide fresh water to the City of New York for over 9 years. Its flow accounts for about 15 percent of all the fresh water discharged into the oceans by all the rivers of the world.
